CS 164/266 - Computational Geometry Homework 2, 50 Points
Due: Friday, January 26, 11:55pm. Assignments must be turned in using the EEE system.

From the de Berg et al. Computational Geometry textbook:

  1. 10 points. Problem 2.1
  2. 10 points. (CS 164 students only) Problem 2.2
  3. 10 points. (CS 164 students only) Problem 2.5
  4. 10 points. Problem 2.6
  5. 10 points. Problem 2.9
  6. 10 points. (CS 266 students only) Problem 2.11
  7. 10 points. (CS 266 students only) Problem 2.14
